critique: This document is an executive order regarding the transfer of facilities, assets, personnel, and responsibilities related to the Panama Canal from The Panama Canal agency to the Panama Railroad Company (which is renamed the Panama Canal Company). It outlines specific exceptions to the transfer, including certain buildings, structures, and personnel related to civil government, health, sanitation, and protection. The order also revokes previous orders related to employee housing and rates for supplies and services. The document focuses on administrative and logistical changes within the U.S. government's management of the Panama Canal and Canal Zone.
